title: Oracle's Diplomacy
description: A plane carrying an Internationals ambassador vanishes over Europe and is found hours later safely on the ground with the aircrew and passengers still inside, dead. All except for the ambassador, who disappears without a trace.When Oracle is called on to help in the race against time to find the one man who can ensure the survival of two desperate nations and prevent a volatile region from erupting in war, the woman behind it must once again step up, while she is still reeling from the too recent threat to her own life.And when a turn of events brings the path of an investigation led by USFID agent Donovan Pierce to cross that of Oracleâ€™s mission, Lara Holsworth must also once again work with him, even as she is still trying to accept his presence in her life.
author: A. Claire Everward
